definition[0]: to stop trying to do something because you are tired, bored etc
example[0]: Dan pooped out about halfway through the race.
definition[1]: to decide not to do something you have already said you would do, because you are tired or not interested
example[1]: ‘Is Bill coming along?’ ‘Nah, he’s pooping out on us.’
definition[2]: if a machine or piece of equipment poops out, it stops working
example[2]: The laptop’s battery pooped out after only two hours.
